description: Creates a Lambda function URL with the specified authorization type.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Creating a Lambda function URL with AuthType NONE exposes the function publicly, creating an unauthenticated entry point into the AWS environment.
Lambda function URLs provide HTTPS endpoints that can be used for command and control communication.

incidents.description: GuardDuty Extended Threat Detection uncovers cryptomining campaign on Amazon EC2 and Amazon ECS

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateFunctionUrlConfig with AuthType NONE to create a publicly accessible Lambda endpoint as a persistence backdoor, bypassing IAM authentication.
